Rayon Sports vs Amagaju FC

Rayon Sports 2-0 Amagaju FC

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Ngabo Roben

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:25

Impinduka ku rutonde rwa shampiyona

Ikipe ya Rayon Sports ihise yisubiza umwanya wa gatatu yari yambuwe na Police FC kuko yo yatsinzwe na Bugesera FC 3-1, mu mukino wabereye ku kibuga cyo ku Kicukiro

17:24

Umukino urarangiye

Umukino wahuzaga Rayon Sports n'Amagaju FC urangiye mu byishimo bya Robertinho utsinze umukino wa mbere nyuma yo kongera amasezerano.

17:22

89' Ikarita y'umuhondo ku ruhande rw'Amagaju FC

Manishimwe Djabel atunguye ba myugariro b'Amagaju yirukankana umupira agana mu izamu ryabo, Munyemana Charles amukorera ikosa rimuhesha ikarita y'umuhondo, haboneka coup franc ariko birangira Djabel ayiteye mu rukuta

17:17

84' Gusimbuza ku mpande zombi

Mutsinzi Ange Jimmy asimbuye Iradukunda Eric Radu wagize ikibazo cy'imvune ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports naho Shyaka Pierre Celestin asimbura Fabrice Irambona w'Amagaju FC

17:14

82' Koruneri ya Rayon Sports

Iradukunda Eric Radu azamukanye umupira ashatse kuwutanga mu rubuga rw'amahina ugarurwa na ba myugariro b'Amagaju ujya muri Koruneri iterwa na Djabel Manishimwe ariko umupira ahaye Rwatubyaye ujya hejuru y'izamu

17:10

78' Contre-Attaque y'Amagaju FC irapfubye

Nzabonimana Emmanuel na Ndubuisi Emmanuel bazamukanye umupira bahererekanya neza ariko Eric Irambona arihuta abanyuraho abambura umupira bitamugoye

17:02

70' Ikaze kuri Mugisha FranÃ§ois Master wari umaze amezi abiri adakina

Tariki ya 2 Ukwakira 2018 nibwo umukinnyi wo hagati wa Rayon Sports Mugisha Francois Master yabazwe urutugu kuva ubwo ntiyongera gukina umupira w'amaguru. Ubu yarakize none yinjiye mu kibuga asimbuye Michael Sarpong utitwaye neza muri uyu mukino

16:56

Mu yindi mikino, abatuye i Bugesera bashobora kurya ubunani neza

Ku kibuga cyo ku Kicukiro ikipe ya Bugesera FC yatsinze igitego cya kabiri ku munota wa 60 cyatsinzwe na Ikechukwu Samson, naho ku munota wa 68 Rucogoza Djihad atsindira Bugesera FC igitego cya gatatu. Umutoza Seninga Innocent wa Bugesera FC akomeje kubabaza Police FC yahoze atoza.

16:53

Ibyamamare bitandukanye byakurikiranye uyu mukino

Uwahoze ari umunyamakuru Uwizeye Soudy uzwi nka Ally Soudy ubu utuye muri Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika ari mu baje kureba uyu mukino

16:47

56' gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports

Bukuru Christopher watsinze igitego cya mbere yagize ikibazo cy'imvune none asimbujwe rutahizamu Raphael Jonathan DaSilva

16:45

Mu yindi mikino

Ikipe ya Police FC ibonye igitego cyo kwishyura ikipe ya Bugesera FC ku munota wa 55. Igitego cyatsinzwe na Iyabivuze Osee

16:42

48' IGITEGO CYA KABIRI CYA RAYON SPORTS: Caleb

Rutahizamu Bimenyimana Bonfils Caleb wari umaze imikino itanu adakina kubera ibihano bya FERWAFA atsindiye Rayon Sports ku kazi gakomeye yikoreye ubwe. Afashe umupira ari hafi ku murongo ugabanyamo ikibuga kabiri arawirukankana agana izamu ry'Amagaju FC acenga Ndikumana Tresor ahita atera mu nguni y'izamu umunyezamu atarimo.

Uyu rutahizamu w'ikipe y'igihugu y'u Burundi yujuje ibitego bitandatu muri shampiyona

16:37

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

Igice cya kabiri gitangijwe n'Amagaju FC ariko umupira bongera kuwutakaza ufatwa n'abakinnyi ba Rayon Sports bakomeje guhererekanya hagati mu kibuga

16:21

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

Ikipe ya Rayon Sports irangije iminota 45 ya mbere iyoboye umukino uri kuyihuza n'Amagaju FC, n'igitego kimwe ku busa cyatsinzwe na Bukuru Christopher bavanye muri Mukura VS mu mpeshyi y'uyu mwaka, igitego cya mbere atsindiye Rayon Sports kuva yayigeramo

16:19

Umunota umwe w'inyongera ku gice cya mbere

Umusifuzi wa kane Ishimwe Jean Claude yemeje ko hongerwaho umunota umwe w'inyongera ku gice cya mbere

16:16

41' Ntabwo ari umunsi mwiza kuri Michael Sarpong

Rutahizamu w'umunya-Ghana Michael Sarpong usanzwe uba mu bagira amanota menshi muri Rayon Sports yagowe cyane n'uyu mukino. Imipira myinshi ari gukoraho ari kuyitakaza igafatwa n'abakinnyi b'Amagaju FC

16:13

35' Ikarita y'umuhondo ku ruhande rw'Amagaju FC

Jean de Dieu Manishimwe akoreye ikosa Eric Irambona wihutaga agana ku izamu ry'Amagaju FC. Umusifuzi Ngaboyisonga Patrick wayoboye uyu mukino ahise amuha ikarita y'umuhondo ariko coup franc ya Rayon Sports ntacyo ibyaye

16:01

26' Ikarita ya mbere y'umuhondo

Umukinnyi w'ikipe y'igihugu y'u Burundi y'abatarengeje imyaka 23 Tresor Ndikumana azamuka umupira ku ruhande rw'ibumoso akorerwa ikosa na Abdul Rwatubyaye bimubyarira ikarita y'umuhondo. Coup franc ibonetse Tresor arayitereye ariko umupira ukurwamo neza na Mazimpaka Andre wishimiwe cyane n'abafana ba Rayon Sports

15:59

Mu yindi mikino

Mu mukino uri guhuza Police FC na Bugesera FC ku kibuga cyo ku Kicukiro naho habonetse igitego cya mbere. Kapiteni wa Bugesera FC Steve Nzikumasabo ukomoka i Burundi yamaze gufungura amazamu.

15:57

22' Koruneri ya Rayon Sports

Umupira uzamukanywe na Manishimwe Djabel agerageza kuwuha ba rutahizamu bari mu rubuga rw'amahina ariko Dusabe Jean Claude arawurenza. Koruneri itewe na Bukuru Christopher ariko umupira Sarpong agerageje kuwutsinda ntiwamukundira ujya hanze

15:51

16' Amagaju FC y'i Nyamagabe ntabwo yorohewe

Umunyezamu amaze kwitabwaho umukino urakomeza ariko Ikipe y'Amagaju FC yashinzwe n'Umutware Rutaremara ubwo yari amaze kugabirwa ubutware bw'u Bufundu ku ngoma ya Rudahigwa ntabwo ihagaze neza. Bimenyimana Bonfils Caleb yongeye gusigarana na Twagirimana ku nshuro ya kane uyu munyezamu akuramo umupira

15:47

Umukino ubaye uhagaze

Uyu munyezamu akuyemo imipira ibiri yabazwe imbere y'izamu ry'Amagaju FC none aryamye hasi ataka umugongo. Abaganga b'ikipe ye bari kumuvura.

15:44

10' Twagirimana Pacifique urindira Amagaju FC niwe mutabazi

Ikipe y'Amagaju FC iri gusatirwa bikomeye. Rutahizamu Michael Sarpong acomekewe umupira mwiza na Irambona asigarana n'umunyezamu Twagirimana ariko yongera gutabara izamu rye.

15:41

08' IGITEGO CYA MBERE CYA Rayon Sports

Umupira uzamukanywe neza na Manishimwe Djabel awucomekera Bimenyimana Bonfils Caleb asigarana n'umunyezamu ariko awuteye Twagirimana awukuramo usubira kuri Caleb ahita awuha Bukuru Christophe ateresha akaguru k'imoso afungura amazamu.

Uku ni ko Rayon Sports itangiye yifuriza umwaka mushya abakunzi bayo!

15:39

04' Ishoti rikomeye rye mbere mu mukino

Umukino utangiranye umutuzo mwinshi ariko Donkor Prosper Kuka ukina hagati muri Rayon Sports ateye ishoti rikomeye gusa umupira unyuze hejuru y'izamu rya Twagirimana

15:37

Rayon Sports iri gukina uyu mukino ibura bamwe basanzwe babanza mu kibuga

Fabrice Mugheni Kakule Kasereka na Rutanga Eric ni abakinnyi ba Rayon Sports batabanje mu kibuga uyu munsi kubera ibibazo by'imvune.

15:34

Umukino ugiye kuyoborwa n'umusifuzi ukizamuka uratangiye

Ishyirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Rwanda ryahisemo ko uyu mukino uyoborwa na Patrick Ngaboyisonga wazamuwe mu cyiciro cya mbere muri uyu mwaka. Umukino utangijwe na Bimenyimana Bonfils Caleb wa Rayon Sports

15:33

Abasore ku mpande zombi bariteguye

15:26

Abakinnyi 11 babanje mu kibuga mu Amagaju FC

Umunyezamu: Twagirimana Pacifique

Ba myugariro: Biraboneye Ambroise, Dusabe Jean Claude, Usengimana Jean Pierre na Munyemana Charles

Abakina hagati: Ndikumana Tresor (c), Mugisha Josue Albert na Manishimwe Jean de Dieu

Ba rutahizamu: Irambona Fabrice, Nzabonimana Emmanuel na Ndubuisi Emmanuel

15:25

Robertinho ubwo yageraga ku kibuga

15:20

Umukino wa mbere kuri Mazimpaka wahoze muri Musanze FC

Umuzamu Rayon Sports yakuye muri Musanze FC, agiye gusoza umwaka neza kuko kuri uyu munsi yabanje mu kibuga mu bakinnyi 11 bagiye guhangana na Amagaju FC.

14:59

Amagaju ari mu bukene bukabije


Amagaju FC agiye gukina uyu mukino ari ku mwanya wa nyuma ku rutonde rwa shampiyona kandi avugwamo ibibazo by'amikoro kuko abakozi bayo bamaze amazi ane badahembwa.

14:53

Abatunganya i Kibuga bakoze akazi kabo

14:53

Umwaka mushya kuri mwese!

Reka dutangire tubifuriza gusoza umwaka neza no gutangira utaha mu mahoro.

Turi i Nyamirambo aho Rayon Sports igiye guhangana n'Amagaju FC mu mukino w'umunsi wa 12 wa Shampiyona y'u Rwanda. Ni Umukino wa mbere Robertinho agiye gutoza nyuma yo kongera amasezerano y'umwaka umwe muri Rayon Sports.
